sume þa boceras of þam treowum heowon & streowodon on þone weg.
WSCp MARK 11.9 & þa ðe beforan eodon & þa ðe æfter folgodon cwædon þus,
osanna, sy gebletsod se þe com on Drihtnes naman.
WSCp MARK 11.10 Si gebletsod þæt rice þe com ures fæder Dauides, osanna on heahnessum.
WSCp MARK 11.11 And he eode þa on Hierosolima templ
& ealle þing he besceawode;
þa æfentima wæs he ferde to Bethaniam mid his twelf leorningcnihtum.
WSCp MARK 11.12 And oþrum dæge þa hi ferdon fram Bethania hine hingrode.
WSCp MARK 11.13 Ða he feorran geseah an fictreow þe leaf hæfde, he com & sohte hwæþer he þar on aht funde;
þa he him to com ne funde he þar buton leaf ane;
Soðlice hit wæs þæs fictreowes tima.
WSCp MARK 11.14 Þa cwæð he,
heonon forð on ecnesse ne ete ænig mann wæstm of þe;
& his leorningcnihtas þæt gehyrdon.
WSCp MARK 11.15 Þa comon hi eft to Hierusalem
& þa he on þæt templ eode he ongann drifan of þam temple syllende & bicgende,
& mynetera þrocu & heahsetlu þe þa culfran cypton he to bræc.
WSCp MARK 11.16 & he ne geþafode þæt ænig man ænig fæt ðurh þæt templ bære.
WSCp MARK 11.17 & he þa lærende ðus cwæð to him,
nis hit awriten þæt min hus fram eallum þeodum bið genemned gebedhus;
Soðlice ge dydon þæt to sceaðena scræfe.
WSCp MARK 11.18 Ða þæra sacerda ealdras & þa boceras ðis gehyrdon, hi þohton hu hi hine forspildon; þeh hi him adredon hine forðam eall seo menigu wundrode be his lare.
WSCp MARK 11.19 And þa hit æfen wæs he eode of þære ceastre.
WSCp MARK 11.20 On merigen þa hi ferdon hi gesawon þæt fictreow forscruncen of þam wyrtruman.
WSCp MARK 11.21 Þa cwæð Petrus,
Lareow, loca hu forscranc þæt fictreow þe ðu wyrigdest.
WSCp MARK 11.22 Ða cwæð se hælend him andswarigende,
habbað Godes truwan.
WSCp MARK 11.23 Ic secge eow to soðe,
swa hwylc swa cwyþ to ðisum munte, si þu afyrred & on sæ aworpen, & on his heortan ne twynað ac gelyfð swa hwæt swa he cwyð gewurðe þis þæt gewyrð.
WSCp MARK 11.24 Forþam ic eow secge,
swa hwæt swa ge gyrnende biddað gelyfað þæt ge hit onfoð,
& hit eow becymð.
WSCp MARK 11.25 And þonne ge standað eow to gebiddenne, forgifaþ gif ge hwæt agen ænigne habbað, þæt eow eower synna forgyfe eower heofonlica fæder se ðe on heofonum ys.
WSCp MARK 11.26 Gif ge ne forgyfað, ne eow eower synna ne forgyfð eower heofonlica fæder.
WSCp MARK 11.27 Ða com he eft to Hierusalem;
& þa he on þam temple eode, him to genealæhton þa heahsacerdos & boceras & ealdras. WSCp MARK 11.28 & þus cwædon,
on hwylcum anwealde dest þu ðas þing;
& hwa sealde þe ðisne anweald þæt þu ðis do?
WSCp MARK 11.29 Þa cwæð se hælend,
& ic ahsige eow anre spræce;
Andswariað me,
& ic secge eow þonne on hwylcum anwealde ic þis do.
WSCp MARK 11.30 Hweðer wæs Iohannes fulluht, þe of heofone þe of mannum;
Andswariað me.
WSCp MARK 11.31 Ða þohton hi & cwædon betweox him,
gif we secgað of heofone, he segð us
hwi ne gelyfde ge him.
WSCp MARK 11.32 Gif we secgað of mannum, we ondrædaþ þis folc;
Ealle hi hæfdon Iohannem þæt he wære soðlice witega.
WSCp MARK 11.33 Þa andswaredon hi þam hælende & cwædon,
we nyton;
ða cwæð se hælend,
ne ic eow ne secge on hwylcum anwealde ic þas þing do.
WSCp MARK 12.1 Ða ongan he him bigspell reccan;
Sum mann him plantode wingeard & betynde hine & dealf anne seað & getimbrode ænne stypel & gesette hine mid eorðtilium; & ferde on elþeodignysse.
WSCp MARK 12.2 Þa sende he to þam tiligum his þeow on tide þæt he þæs wingeardes wæstm onfenge.
WSCp MARK 12.3 Ða swungon hi þæne & forleton hine idelhende.
WSCp MARK 12.4 And eft he him sende oðerne þeow
& hi þone on heafde gewundodon & mid teonum geswencton.
WSCp MARK 12.5 And eft he him sumne sende
& hi þæne ofslogon & manega oþre;
Sume hi beoton,
sume hi ofslogon.
WSCp MARK 12.6 Þa hæfde he þa gyt ænne leofostne sunu;
þa sende he æt nehstan him þæne & cwæð,
witodlice minne sunu hig forwandiað.
WSCp MARK 12.7 Ða cwædon þa tilian him betweonan,
her is se yrfenuma;
Uton ofslean hine,
þonne bið ure seo yrfeweardnes.
WSCp MARK 12.8 Hi þa ofslogon hine & wurpon wiðutan þone wingeard.
WSCp MARK 12.9 Hwæt deð þæs wingeardes hlaford;
